section.para: To view Sales history by Customer Group, select the "Sales History by Customer Group" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying Sales history by Customer Group, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display Sales history for all Customer Groups.
Specify Customer Group whose Sales history you want to display.
Enter a Customer Group pattern to select a range of Customer Groups. Refine your search using Regular Expressions.
Select to display Sales history by Customer Group for all Sites.
Specify Site whose Sales history by Customer Group you want to display.
Sales history by Customer Group generated on or after this date will be displayed.
Sales history by Customer Group generated on or before this date will be displayed.
Select to include Costs in the display.
Select to include Prices in the display.
Display lists Sales history by Customer Group, using the specified parameters. Prices are normalized to the Base Currency using the Currency Exchange Rate effective on the Invoice Date.
